_Meta.description: Meta information about the request or response

prisma.description: Indicates if the error occurred during a Prisma call

rejectedByPolicy.description: Indicates if the error was due to rejection by a policy

code.description: Prisma error code. Only available when "prisma" field is true.

zodErrors.description: Zod validation errors if the error is due to data validation failure
